desc: Cornacs are Humans from the northern parts of the Allied Kingdoms.
name: Cornac

desc: Doomelves are not a real race, they are Shaloren that have been taken by demons and transformed into harbingers of doom.
name: Doomelf

desc: Dwarves are a secretive people, hailing from their underground home of the Iron Throne.
name: Dwarf

desc: Ghouls are dumb, but resilient, rotting undead creatures, making good fighters.
name: Ghoul

desc: Halflings are a race of very short stature, rarely exceeding four feet in height.
name: Halfling

desc: Highers are a special branch of Humans that have been imbued with latent magic since the Age of Allure.
name: Higher

desc: Ogres are an altered form of Human, created in the Age of Allure as workers and warriors for the Conclave.
name: Ogre

desc: Shaloren elves have close ties with the magic of the world, and produced in the past many great mages.
name: Shalore

desc: Skeletons are animated bones, undead creatures both strong and dexterous.
name: Skeleton

desc: Thaloren elves have spent most of the ages hidden within their forests, seldom leaving them.
name: Thalore

desc: Yeeks are a mysterious race native to the tropical island of Rel.
name: Yeek
